title: Did Trump Write ‘Never Admit Defeat’ in ‘Art of the Deal’?
subtitle: While President Trump may never admit defeat, he did not write that in "The Art of the Deal."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A passage from chapter 45 of U.S. President Donald Trump's book "The Art of the Deal" reads: "Never admit defeat. You win. If you don't win claim they cheated. They rigged it. They stole it."
